title: Duplicate emails on zoho server
content:
Hi there,

This used to be a bug last year & then it was fixed & now it's back. Bugzilla said to contact you guys.

I am still on 102, & I don't want to switch to 115 yet.

Here's the bug which caused me a lot of stress last week...

I've been getting tons of duplicate emails coming into multiple account's inbox all day for several days & zoho is blocking me because of it since it's pinging their server.

I am using Zoho & they are all aliases. I pay for 2 emails & they both have different aliases.

Each account has a filter to filter out the emails from the other addys & only give me the ones for that addy's account.

It's also duplicating them sometimes 15 times AND they go back 2 weeks each time, so not new emails, but 2 week old emails.

It even happens with emails I deleted & filed in my folders.

Help.

Thanks

Expected results:

Just one email in each account.
creator: news8

title: Helper Applcation Missing
content:
Hello There all So I recently installed Win11 and Tbird 115.7.0

My issue is this: When I double click a PDF in a received email it opens up in my default PDF reader (Foxit) so it's all good. When I'm composing an email and add a PDF I like to check to see that I'm sending the correct PDF attachment so I double click and it won't open, I get this message (Attached Image) I went to Tools/Settings/General/Files&Attachments and PDF (Foxit) is set as the default so all good

So again Inbox messages opens PDF's no problem Composing messages won't open PDF's

I used to do this all the time on Win10 and it worked perfectly See my settings in image 2 Thanks In Advance :-)
creator: shop60

title: Default newest on top (including within group sort)
content:
Want to:

  • Sort email by newest on top
  • Include sub-emails within threads for the newest on top (currently still oldest on top)
  • Apply this default setting to all. I don't want to sort every account, every folder manually. That's too tedious.

Thunderbird has oldest on top. This includes emails within a thread/conversation. Changing the sort to newest on top does not change the emails within the thread/conversation. The sort does not apply to all emails. I find this very annoying.
creator: makatogonzo
